## Demographics

```{r rename_demogs}

  rename(ID = , # Participant ID,
         Gender = , # Gender Variable Name,
```

## Distribution

```{r check_dist}
df.mmr %>% select(complaint, memory) %>%
  gather(key = "Measure", value = "Score", contains("ROI")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Score)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1) +
  facet_wrap(~ Measure, scales = 'free')
```
